title: T206 Broad Leaf 460 Danny Murphy Batting SGC 20
author: usernamealreadytaken

posts.post_title: T206 Broad Leaf 460 Danny Murphy Batting SGC 20

posts.post_content: Jeez, that was a blur. Didn't even see card.

the BST BL460 is a story of legend.. when she does pop up.. she only lasts a few minutes .. :) 
(i did not buy the card.. like you, by the time i saw the post it was sold already)

Like a Bearfoot sighting, or Loch Ness.

Mythical. 

(Jamie- funny how we each own one, but we both would’ve attacked it if we were quicker).

#obsessedwithcardboard

;)
I agree, it was gone before I even saw it.   :(
I saw it, inquired, got pics and very reasonable asking price, balked because of heritage tonight, told Jamie, and then it was gone -- and all that happened in like 4 minutes!
